name: OTRF WMI Process Execution
sigma_yaml:
title: WMI Process Execution
id: otrf-t1047-001
status: experimental
description: Detects process execution via WMI
logsource:
    category: process_creation
    product: windows
detection:
    keywords:
        - "wmic"
        - "process call create"
        - "Win32_Process"
    condition: keywords
falsepositives:
    - Administrative activities
    - Security tools
level: medium
tags:
    - attack.t1047
